DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate if there is an association between platelet inhibition and surgery-related bleeding in patients undergoing emergent cardiac surgery during dual antiplatelet therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Platelet Inhibition and Bleeding in Patients Undergoing Emergent Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Blood for measuring platelet function is drawn before induction of anesthesia
DOC.criteria: First time onpump CABG with or without valve replacement Redo surgery, Renal insufficiency needing dialysis, Concomitant medication with warfarin, Preoperative fibrinogen < 150 mg%
